item.description:
Nothing like a good suspense movie! The more the merrier. We had a great turnout last time and I'd love to see you all again. I triple checked the address on the meetup site as well as the IMAX site and it should be correct - the IMAX at Jordan's Furniture in READING! (The tricky part is finding the theater once you're in Jordan's!) Hopefully no one will get lost. And if you do, don't call me for directions cuz I'll get you even more lost ;) Kidding - call me anytime (but I really am horrible at directions).

Trailer
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my red t-shirt and jeans
item.name: Eagle Eye @ IMAX
